tasks.label: Pico Upload
tasks.command: ${command:cmake.tasksBuildCommand} && /usr/bin/gdb-multiarch -q build/main.elf -ex 'target remote localhost:23532' -ex load -ex 'monitor reset halt' -ex 'monitor rp2040.core1 arp_reset assert 0' -ex 'monitor rp2040.core0 arp_reset assert 0' -ex 'set confirm off' -ex quit
